1932 BOULENGER Sept 13 (Madame Bidoire) has got married 26 rue Lisbonne 8e to 10 Feb 1933 28 July 3 mos 1 v 65 dep 50
Boulenger owes
50¢ a day, Gold Falcon 6.50 2f a day " " 6 extra days 12.- 1 post card .40 18.90 22 40.80 to deduct from deposit May 18 brought buell Red Hill's when shop closed July 18 " " " On the Edge ------------ 18 Howards End (extra) B.B. 7 Invitation to the Waltz to 28 July 1 Feb 28 April Gold Falcon 50f p.j. card 8 May May 11 " " 3 mo 1v. 30f May 11 Lovely Lady owes 1890 13 " 13 Red Hills 50f p.j. owes 8f pd. 18 13 Sylvia's Marriage (extra) 2f p.j. 29 1 June To make my bread (new!) p.d. 6 extra 6 June Companionate Marriage 2f a day 10. 10. On the Edge card 15 July owes. 5.40 18 July 18 July Dark Mother card 9 Aug Sept 13 owes subsc and 18.90 plus fine 'Dark Mother' expired July 28 44 days overdue 22 frs
